1password.notes: 14-day free trial; no payment info needed upfront

adobe.notes: 7-day free trial for Creative Cloud; auto-charges after trial ends

amazon_prime.notes: 30-day free trial; auto-converts to paid membership

apple_app_store.notes: No platform-level trial; individual apps may offer trials via App Store subscriptions

apple_music.notes: 1-month free trial for new subscribers; auto-renews at standard rate

apple_tv_plus.notes: 7-day free trial; 3 months free with new Apple device purchase

audible.notes: 30-day free trial with 1 credit; auto-converts to paid

bitwarden.notes: 7-day premium trial; free tier available indefinitely

bumble.notes: 7-day free trial for Bumble Premium; auto-renews

calm.notes: 7-day free trial; auto-charges annual or monthly rate

canva.notes: 30-day Canva Pro free trial; auto-converts to paid plan

chatgpt_plus.notes: No free trial for Plus; free tier (GPT-3.5/limited GPT-4o) available

claude_pro.notes: No free trial for Pro; free tier available with usage limits

coursera_plus.notes: 7-day free trial for Coursera Plus annual; auto-charges

crunchyroll.notes: 7-day free trial for Premium; auto-renews at standard rate

deezer.notes: 1-month free trial for Deezer Premium; auto-converts

disney_plus.notes: No free trial currently offered in US

doordash_dashpass.notes: 30-day DashPass free trial for eligible users; auto-renews monthly

dropbox_us.notes: 30-day free trial for Plus/Professional; auto-converts to paid

duolingo.notes: 14-day Super Duolingo free trial; auto-charges after trial

expressvpn.notes: 7-day free trial on mobile apps; 30-day MBG on all plans

figma.notes: Free starter plan with limited features; Professional trial available

fubo_tv.notes: 7-day free trial; auto-converts to paid subscription

github_pro.notes: No free trial; free tier available with limited features

google_play.notes: No platform-level trial; individual apps may offer trials

grammarly.notes: 7-day Grammarly Premium free trial; auto-converts to paid

headspace.notes: 7-day free trial; auto-renews at selected plan rate

hellofresh.notes: No free trial; discount offers on first boxes for new subscribers

hinge.notes: 7-day free trial for HingeX occasionally offered; auto-renews

hulu.notes: 30-day free trial for eligible new subscribers; auto-converts

icloud_plus.notes: No free trial; 5GB free tier included with Apple ID

instacart_plus.notes: 14-day Instacart+ free trial; auto-converts to annual membership

linkedin_premium.notes: 1-month free trial; auto-converts to paid Premium plan

masterclass.notes: No free trial; 30-day satisfaction guarantee instead

max.notes: No free trial currently offered in US

microsoft_365.notes: 1-month free trial for Personal/Family; auto-converts to annual

midjourney.notes: Free trial periodically suspended; not currently available

netflix.notes: No free trial in US since 2020

nintendo_switch_online.notes: 7-day free trial; auto-converts to monthly membership

noom.notes: 7-day free trial (may vary); auto-converts to paid plan

nordvpn.notes: 7-day free trial on Android; 30-day MBG on all plans

notion.notes: No trial; generous free plan available for individuals

paramount_plus.notes: 7-day free trial for new subscribers; auto-converts to paid

peacock.notes: 7-day free trial for Premium; free ad-supported tier also available

peloton.notes: 30-day free trial for App membership; auto-converts

playstation_plus.notes: 14-day free trial for Essential tier; auto-renews

scribd.notes: 30-day free trial; auto-converts to monthly subscription

shutterstock.notes: 1-month free trial with 10 images; auto-converts to paid annual

slack.notes: 90-day Pro trial for qualifying teams; free tier available indefinitely

sling_tv.notes: No standard free trial; occasional promotional offers

spotify.notes: 1-month free Premium trial for new subscribers; auto-converts

squarespace.notes: 14-day website builder trial; no credit card needed; site goes offline if not converted

surfshark.notes: 7-day free trial on mobile; 30-day MBG on all plans

tidal.notes: 30-day free trial for new subscribers; auto-converts

tinder.notes: No free trial for paid tiers; free tier available with limited features

todoist.notes: 30-day Pro trial; reverts to free tier if not converted

twitch.notes: No free trial for Turbo; free tier available

walmart_plus.notes: 30-day free trial; auto-converts to paid annual or monthly

wix.notes: 14-day money-back guarantee; free plan available; no card needed for free plan

xbox_game_pass.notes: 14-day trial or $1 first month promotions; auto-converts to full price

youtube_premium.notes: 1-month free trial for new subscribers; auto-converts to paid

zoom.notes: No paid plan trial; free Basic plan with 40-minute group meeting limit
